Actions.Name: Acrobatics
Actions.Description: Dash 2. This action can interrupt and split up other actions or movement.

Name: Aerial Acrobat
Description: If an attack misses the Aeronaut, they may deal 2 damage to the attacker, then fly 2.

Name: Aetherwall
Description: Gains automatic cover against all attacks that originate outside of range 2 from them. (Cover grants resistance against ranged attacks, reducing it by 1/2)

Name: Amalgamate
Description: Once a round, while the Grafter is not incapacitated, whenever a relict is defeated anywhere on the battlefield, another relict of the Grafter's choice gains vigor 1.

Name: Amorphous
Description: Can share space with other characters. Any characters that start their turn inside its space take [fray] damage

Name: Arkentech Shock Shield
Description: Has resistance to all damage from closest foe. If multiple foes are equidistant, this trait applies to all of them.

Name: Armor [X]
Description: Reduce all damage taken by [X].

Name: Aura of Immortality
Description: While Immortal is undefeated, it has Aura 2. Relict inside without this trait cannot be reduced past 1 HP.

Name: Aura of Rot
Description: Aura 2. Foes that start or end their turn in the aura lose all vigor, then take 2 piercing damage.

Name: Aura of Freedom
Description: Aura 1. The Guide and allies in the aura are immune to terrain effects, pits, difficult, and dangerous terrain.

Name: Aura of Shielding
Description: Aura 1. The abjurer and allies in the area have dodge.

Name: Aura of the Endless Legion
Description: Aura 2. when any relict is defeated in the aura, summon a husk in a free space in the aura.

Name: Automata
Description: This character always attempts to attack and focus on the closest foe at the start of its turn.

Name: Beyond Death
Description: When defiance activates, roll a d6. On a 4+, this character immediately regains defiance. Attacks with True Strike bypass this trait.

Actions.Name: Bravado
Actions.Description: This character takes damage equal to 50% of their max hp, but immediately gains +1 action. If this would defeat them, it reduces them to 1 hp instead.

Name: Bullheaded
Description: Has resistance unless suffering from a status.

Name: Camaraderie
Description: +1 boon on attacks and saves for every adjacent ally.

Name: Cataclysm
Description: At the start and end of the round create 2 rock spires, height 1 objects, in free space within range 2 of a foe.

Name: Command Aura [X]
Description: Aura [X]. Allies in the aura have +1 boon on attacks.

Name: Counter
Description: Deal 2 damage to your attacker after being attacked, hit or miss.

Name: Defiance
Description: Prevents hit points from being reduced past 1 hp. When this triggers, remove this effect and character becomes immune to all damage for the rest of the current turn.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can end a status or blight. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Name: Divine Presence
Description: Immune to stun.

Name: Dodge
Description: Immune to damage from missed attacks, area effects, and successful saves.

Name: Drag Under
Description: Characters inside the Grave are dragged with it, shoving them. Sturdy foes or foes that are immune to shove are immune to this effect.

Name: Duty of Death
Description: Adjacent allies to this character without this trait have dodge.

Name: Elite
Description: Takes 2 turns.

Name: Enrage
Description: While bloody, gain +1 action.

Name: Eternal Rage
Description: When defeated, instead remain at 1 hp and become intangible until the end of their next turn. At the end of that turn, become defeated.

Name: Eternal War
Description: While the Immortalist is on the battlefield and not defeated, all relict's Rise Again activates on a 2+.

Name: Ethereal
Description: Phasing, and has resistance unless there's an adjacent foe.

Name: Flying
Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Name: Fortify
Description: At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1.

Name: Gran Diaga
Description: Aura 1. At the start of this character's turn, allies in the aura can end a status or blight affecting them. If they are bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Name: Great Enrage
Description: Sturdy and +1 action while bloodied.

Name: Great Faith
Description: If the Chronicler ends their turn with any un-used actions, they can clear all statuses and blight affecting them. If they are bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Name: Greenwalker
Description: Immune to difficult terrain.

Name: Grit
Description: Sturdy when bloodied.

Name: Heavy Armor
Description: Resistant to abilities used from adjacent spaces.

Name: Hold the Line [X]
Description: If this character ends any turn without attacking, they gain Sturdy until the start of their next turn and Vigilance [X].

Name: Hollow
Description: The Stutterghast has aura 1. While there is exactly 1 other character in hollow's aura, it has have evasion and stealth. This aura has no effect if no other characters, or 2 or more other characters are inside, and its effects (including stealth) turn off it if deactivates.

Name: Immortal Disregard
Description: Attacks never miss the Immortal.

Name: Insulated
Description: Immune to damage from terrain and terrain effects.

Actions.Name: Juggernaut
Actions.Description: Clear a status, mark, or all blights affecting this character.

Name: Legend
Description: Takes 1 turn after every player character takes a turn. If slow, only one of its turns is affected.

Name: Legion of the Dead
Description:
Relict are a legion of mindless husks, cursed with an undying existence. This gives them the following traits:
• This character has a chance to rise again when defeated. Roll 1d6 at the start of each round that this character is defeated. On a 4+, this character gets back up at 25% hp, returning it from defeated, and can take a turn normally this round. If defeated again, this character disintegrates and is removed from the battlefield. If all characters with this trait are defeated, it deactivates.
• All Relict can shuffle and dash 1 space at the start of their turn as a free action. When they do this, all other relict in range 2 can also dash 1 space in the same direction, then deal 1 damage to an adjacent foe. For mobs, this shuffle activates for up to five of them simultaneously.
• For every point of Relicts in an encounter, you can add two Husks to a fight

Name: Living Lightning
Description: Electrifies foes it moves through. Foes that are already electrified must save or become slowed. Allied spaces cost 0 movement to pass through.

Name: Living Statue
Description: Cannot dash. When defeated, becomes a height 2 piece of terrain.

Name: Martyrdom
Description: When defeated, grants vigor 1 to all allies in range 2.

Name: Mob
Description: This character doesn't trigger slay effects.

Name: Monster Riding
Description: The Rider starts combat riding a trained monster, and can also mount it as an action or by spending its standard move. While riding, the rider shares space with the monster and moves when it moves. If the two are separated, this effect ends until the monster is remounted.

Summons.Name: Tame Monster
Summons.Actions: During the rider's turn, can dash 4, then either shove a character 1 space or deal 2 damage to them.

Name: Nimble
Description: Has evasion unless suffering from a status.

Name: Open Rift
Description: Create a pit under any character hit by the wraith's attacks.

Name: Overdrive [X]
Description: All attacks after round [X] are critical hits on hit [+D].

Name: Partner Work
Description: Aura 2. When the Acrobat dashes, an ally in the aura may also dash 1.

Name: Phasing
Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Name: Plasma Bomb
Description: At the start of the round, the Warmech fires a plasma bomb into the air, targeted on any visible space. The bomb marks a blast 2 area visible to all characters. At the end of the round, the bomb comes down as an area effect. Characters in the area must save or take 2[D]+[fray] and become electrified, or [D]+[fray] on a successful save. The targeted space then becomes a pit. The Warmech is immune to its own bombs.

Name: Release Passengers
Description: When defeated, summon 5 relict husk mobs in or adjacent to its space.

Name: Rook
Description: Grants cover to adjacent allies.

Name: Roppo
Description: The first time on any turn a foe takes an action in range 2, the Yaman may dash 2, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Name: Salty
Description: When the Sailor deals self damage, they gain vigor 1 after taking the damage.

Name: Shambling
Description: Cannot dash.

Name: Shed Flesh
Description: When bloodied, immediately recharges and uses Horrify. For the rest of combat, becomes phasing and flying.

Name: Shed Mass
Description: 1/turn, when the Grave takes damage, it summons a husk in a free adjacent space. When the Grave is bloodied, it summons 5 husks instead.

Name: Shelter
Description: +1 boon on saves.

Name: Size [X]
Description: This character takes up a [X] by [X] area of spaces.

Name: Skirmish
Description: Can move diagonally, and dash moves full speed.

Name: Slam
Description: When a character collides from this character's shoves, they are dazed. Dazed characters also take [D]+[fray].

Actions.Name: Slip
Actions.Description: Remove self from the battlefield, then return within 1 space.

Name: Slippery
Description: While bloodied, has evasion.

Name: Soul Mass
Description: Can share space with other characters. Foes treat the space as difficult terrain, are dazed+ while inside, and have cover from the outside, but are otherwise targetable normally. Any foes that start their turn inside its space take [fray] damage. Foes that attempt to leave the Grave's space by any means must save or become unable to exit it until the end of the current turn.

Name: Stack Dice
Description: Once a combat, when the Churner would roll a random d6 as part of an ability, they can choose which number to roll.

Actions.Name: Stack Dice Move
Actions.Description: Roll 1d6 and move (not dash) that many spaces.

Name: Strength
Description: This character's abilities have Collide: [fray] damage and foe is dazed. Dazed foes take [D]+[fray] instead.

Actions.Name: Strive
Actions.Description: Until the start of their next turn, the Guilder increases the distance of any dash, teleport or flight by +3.

Name: Stoneskin
Description: Has resistance while adjacent to an object.

Name: Sturdy
Description: Immune to shove, dazed, and stunned.

Name: Stutter
Description: Once a turn, after a foe takes an action in range 2 of the ghast, it may teleport 1 and deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Name: Surreality
Description: Starts combat bloodied, but with vigor 1.

Name: The Old Blood
Description: Immune to blights.

Name: Tumbling
Description: Moving up terrain costs no movement. Can phase through characters and doing so costs 0 movement.

Name: Unstable
Description: When defeated, explodes in a blast 1 explosion centered on the wraith. Characters inside take [D] piercing damage, twice, as an area effect. The wraith is then removed from the battlefield. Create a pit in the area it vacated.

Name: Unstable Reality
Description: 1/turn, teleports 1 when damaged by an ability.
